name: Rust
r1: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 40% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 10%
r2: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 50% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 10%
r3: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 60% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 10%
r4: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 70% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 10%
r5: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 80% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 10%
